rules_text: Ploy – Scrappy Wispspeaker deals 1 damage to any target. If that target isn't a creature, create a 1/1 Wonder creature token that's all colors. [i](When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“They don't seem to mind dying, and I sure don't mind having them die for me.”[/i]
